meanings.definition: A drug used to lower cholesterol levels in the blood.
meanings.sent1: The doctor prescribed gemfibrozils to help reduce my cholesterol levels.
meanings.sent2: Many people take gemfibrozils to manage their cholesterol.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally mistook gemfibrozils for candy, thinking they would magically lower my cholesterol.
meanings.sent4: Her cholesterol dropped like a stone after starting gemfibrozils.
meanings.sent5: Gemfibrozils are like little warriors fighting against high cholesterol in your body.

meanings.sent1: The pharmacy ran out of gemfibrozils, so I had to wait for a new shipment.
meanings.sent2: I bought two bottles of gemfibrozils for my grandparents.
meanings.sent3: The gemfibrozils on the shelf looked like a colorful collection of pills.
meanings.sent4: In her handbag, she carried a secret stash of gemfibrozils.
meanings.sent5: The gemfibrozils in the container rattled softly as she moved.
